Articles.Content: For now it\'s been decided by the Dev team and the Mod team to shut down the main dev board and open two child boards for bug reporting and suggestions. As it stands the Dev team will still post updates in their sticked blog threads and we will still have one public discussion thread.

Does this mean that all relevant topics will be transferred to the respective boards, as recent ones have?

EDIT: A ton of recent topics have been moved, so I\'ll assume so.

The dev board was getting a bit messy so its a very welcome change

but one question, Will the Dev specific discussion threads still be in the main development page or will they be moved elsewhere?
Should questions to game devs relating game mechanics (e.g. 'what\'s the model for air drag in KSP?') go to General Discussion section?

Should questions to game devs relating game mechanics (e.g. 'what\'s the model for air drag in KSP?') go to General Discussion section?

No, we\'ll have another public thread.

Aah we have a suggestion section. I don\'t think I will use it but I\'ve seen lots of suggestions the last few months so this is very welcome.

I hope that this re-organisation also give the mods a better overview.
